description: Number of permutations in S_n avoiding the strings 123, 321 and 231.
links: S. Kitaev, Multi-avoidance of generalized patterns, Discrete Math., 260 (2003), 89-100.
formula: a(0)=1, a(1)=1, a(2)=2, a(3)=3, a(n) = (n-2)a(n-2)+(n-3)!! for n >= 4Exponential generating function for A(n)=a(n+1) (n>=0): (1+x)*exp(x^2/2)*(1+sqrt(Pi/2)*erf(x/sqrt(2))), where erf denotes the error function. - Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)hotmail.com), Nov 01 2002a(n) = (n-1)!!+(n-2)!! (cf. A006882).
